id: Notion Template Pack x3: People development tools for New Managers
name: Notion Template Pack x3: People development tools for New Managers
description: For People Managers, Business Owners, and HR professionals.A collection of comprehensive Notion templates to help you develop the skills of your teams.1️⃣ Use the Individual development plan to:-> empower your team members to define their development priorities-> help them take ownership of their learning-> guide them to the right resources and stretch assignments to grow in their career2️⃣ Use the strengths map to:-> identify where each team member excels-> use a common vocabular
features: This is a Notion template.Get Notion(this template works on both Free and Premium accounts).*; Duplicate the template to your Notion space. Keep it private!; Use the existing page, or generate a new page with the template button.; Adapt each of the templates to your team (add the names of your team members, create custom views).; Share the page with the relevant team member (careful, the skills gap analysis should stay confidential).; Three ready-to-use templates to develop the skills of your team: personal growth plan, strengths map, skills gap analysis; Explanation on how to use the templates .; Template button to recreate the templates every time you need a fresh start.
